metadata.dc:author: Gil Tutor, E
metadata.dc:description: In the paper is reported the case of a patient carrying a cholesteatoma located at the cerebellopontine angle. Firstly he came by us because of his auditive impairment and equilibratory troubles, as well. These are the reasons of this text: to review all aspects clinical, diagnostic and therapeutical of the disease.
metadata.dc:title: Colesteatoma del ángulo pontocerebeloso. A propósito de un caso.
[Cholesteatoma of the cerebellopontine angle. A case report].
